name: UI Design Review
description: Review UI components for design system compliance, accessibility, and responsiveness
prompt: Review this UI code for: 1) Design system compliance (colors, typography, spacing), 2) Accessibility (ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, contrast), 3) Responsiveness (mobile-first, breakpoints), 4) Professional appearance (animations, hover states, visual hierarchy). Suggest improvements to make it more luxurious and user-appealing.
